resources.string: Hello friends welcome to KLINIK. A redefined solution for finding a Docter consultancy service at your home
We provide almost all the locations of charging station. You can also book your slot in advance at your favorite charging station
You can plan your trips more efficiently by our latest trip planner option by getting all the charger location coming in your route.
We will handle everything for you. As you have the app in your pocket then you does not have to worry.
